Package com.dp16.dynamicrunninginghent.DataProvider

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DataProvider
    Interface that should be implemented by all dataproviders Provide a start, resume, pause and stop method Stop is the counterpart of start, they should only be called once.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AndroidWearProvider
    This dataprovider offers an interface with an android wearable via bluetooth.
    DistanceProvider
    This should be started when a run is started.
    InCityChecker
    Class that checks whether the runner in currently located in a given city (as of now only Ghent).
    Kalman
    This class is used to smooth the location updates that are received from the Google FusionLocationProvider.
    LocationProvider
    LocationProvider class provides location requests.
    RatingTransmitter
    This DataProvider will send ratings of runs to the server.
    RouteProvider
    Class that allows fetching a JSONObject.
    SpeedProvider
    This class calculates and publishes a speed value based on location values.
    TimingProvider
    This class provides a timer to time a run.
